content: lion brand pattern # 20224 *cce-rainbowbabyblanket pdf* corrections applied aug 13 2003 skill level easy level 2 cotton-ease® original article #700 *discontinued* 5 colors 2 balls each 10 balls total *#830 cotton-ease can be substituted * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm gauge each square measures 7½ inches x 7½ inches 19 mm rainbows make 5 one in each color sequence plain square make one in each color rainbow motif square make three in each color sew one rainbow to center of each plain square sew squares together following schematic crochet border to finish
